title: Immune System Archives
author: Heather Adams
cleaned_text: [ Stop Falling for These 5 Immunity-Boosting Myths ](https://www.betternutrition.com/conditions-and-wellness/immunity-tips/stop-falling-for-these-5-immunity-boosting-myths/) Don't let bad advice lead your immune system astray. Find out which immunity-boosting tips are nothing more than myths - and what you should actually do to stay healthy when cold season arrives.
